Question.Subject: my sky broadband is active as of wednesday and therefore bt will disappear.?
Question.Content: i desperately need to save some emails from my bt account. i normally access them through yahoo mail. how do i save them or move them? now you may think cause i'm on here i know my way around a computer. wrong i know far more about the internals of a farm animal than you'll ever need to know. so if you answer this please put it in english and not computer speak. cheers
Question.ChosenAnswer: you need'nt worry. I am on Sky but I can still access my e-mails in my yahoo account and my wife still uses her btinternet e-mail account. My children still use their yahoo accounts as well. So as I said don't worry as everything will carry on as normal. It will only be your internet provider that changes. I think you have made a good choice with Sky by the way. Good luck.

Answer.Content: why dont you press send on the emails and sent them to your yahoo account. this a very easy way, all you need to know is how to send an email lol. goodluck anyway with that.

you need'nt worry. I am on Sky but I can still access my e-mails in my yahoo account and my wife still uses her btinternet e-mail account. My children still use their yahoo accounts as well. So as I said don't worry as everything will carry on as normal. It will only be your internet provider that changes. I think you have made a good choice with Sky by the way. Good luck.
